content.html: Every day Instagram is like “ok, your thing doesn’t seem to be Billie Eilish fan accounts after all. Is it... The Office? Is it wine mom memes? Is it videos of piercings that got infected?” Pictures of my friends. It was pictures of my friends, you had it, you lost it
content.value:
Every day Instagram is like “ok, your thing doesn’t seem to be Billie Eilish fan accounts after all. Is it... The Office? Is it wine mom memes? Is it videos of piercings that got infected?”

Pictures of my friends. It was pictures of my friends, you had it, you lost it
